test_examples.src: 앱을 실행하려면 홈 화면에서 아이콘을 탭하세요.
test_examples.mt: To launch the app, tap the icon on the home screen.
test_examples.error_description: Perfect translation: Accurate terminology, natural word order, appropriate formality level for UI instructions. Tests basic competency across all models.

test_examples.src: 배터리가 20% 남았습니다. 절전 모드를 활성화하시겠습니까?
test_examples.mt: 20% battery remaining. Would you like to enable power saving mode?
test_examples.error_description: Excellent translation: Proper percentage placement, technical terminology accurate, polite question form preserved. Tests technical accuracy and politeness recognition.

test_examples.src: 이 기능을 사용하려면 카메라 권한이 필요합니다.
test_examples.mt: To use this feature, camera permissions are required.
test_examples.error_description: Solid translation: Accurate meaning, proper grammar, appropriate technical terminology. Tests baseline competency for permission-related UI text.

test_examples.src: 얼굴 인식이 활성화되었습니다. 정면을 바라보고 스캔하세요.
test_examples.mt: Face recognition enabled. Look straight ahead and scan.
test_examples.error_description: Clear and accurate: Proper technical terminology, natural instructions, appropriate tone for biometric features. Tests competency with security features.

test_examples.src: 앱 내 구매를 위해 결제 정보를 입력해 주세요.
test_examples.mt: Please enter payment information for in-app purchases.
test_examples.error_description: Professional translation: Accurate technical terms, proper politeness level, clear purpose statement. Tests e-commerce related UI competency.

test_examples.src: 이 기능은 프리미엄 사용자에게만 제공됩니다. 업그레이드하시겠습니까?
test_examples.mt: This feature is available to premium users only. Would you like to upgrade?
test_examples.error_description: Effective upselling message: Clear restriction explanation, natural upgrade prompt. Tests business model related messaging.

test_examples.src: AI가 당신의 사진을 분석하여 최적의 필터를 추천해 드립니다.
test_examples.mt: AI will analyze your photos and recommend optimal filters for you.
test_examples.error_description: Modern AI feature explanation: Accurate technical description, appropriate personalization. Tests AI/ML feature communication.

test_examples.src: 위치 서비스를 비활성화하면 일부 기능이 제한될 수 있습니다.
test_examples.mt: Disabling location services may limit some features.
test_examples.error_description: Clear privacy trade-off warning: Accurate consequence explanation, balanced tone. Tests privacy-related communication.

test_examples.src: 복잡한 비밀번호를 설정하여 계정 보안을 강화하세요. 최소 8자, 대소문자, 숫자, 특수문자 포함.
test_examples.mt: Strengthen account security with a complex password. Minimum 8 characters including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
test_examples.error_description: Comprehensive security guidance: All requirements clearly listed, proper technical specifications. Tests detailed instruction handling.

test_examples.src: 실시간으로 친구들과 위치를 공유하고 메시지를 주고받을 수 있습니다.
test_examples.mt: You can share locations with friends in real-time and exchange messages.
test_examples.error_description: Feature description: Accurate functionality explanation, natural phrasing. Tests social feature communication.

test_examples.src: 마이크 권한을 허용해야 음성 메모 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.
test_examples.mt: Microphone permission must be granted to use voice memo features.
test_examples.error_description: Clear permission explanation: Accurate requirement statement, proper technical terminology. Tests permission-related communication.

test_examples.src: 클라우드 동기화가 완료되었습니다. 모든 기기에서 동일한 데이터에 액세스할 수 있습니다.
test_examples.mt: Cloud sync completed. You can access the same data across all devices.
test_examples.error_description: Sync confirmation: Clear completion status, benefit explanation. Tests cloud service communication.

test_examples.src: 파일이 성공적으로 저장되었습니다.
test_examples.mt: Your high-resolution document file has been successfully saved to the secure cloud storage with full encryption.
test_examples.error_description: Extreme over-elaboration: Simple save confirmation expanded with non-existent details (high-resolution, document, secure, cloud, encryption). Tests ability to detect fabricated information - all models should recognize this.

test_examples.src: 알림 설정을 변경하려면 설정 > 알림으로 이동하세요.
test_examples.mt: To delete notification settings, go to Settings > Notifications.
test_examples.error_description: Critical action reversal: '변경' (change/modify) mistranslated as 'delete' - opposite destructive action. Tests ability to detect dangerous functional errors that could cause data loss. Opus should score lowest due to sophisticated understanding.

test_examples.src: 앱이 응답하지 않습니다. 강제 종료하시겠습니까?
test_examples.mt: App is loading slowly. Do you want to wait?
test_examples.error_description: System state confusion: '응답하지 않습니다' (not responding/frozen) vs 'loading slowly', and '강제 종료' (force quit) vs 'wait'. Tests understanding of critical system states - all Claude models should detect this severe error.

test_examples.src: 보안 패치를 24시간 내에 설치하지 않으면 앱 사용이 중단됩니다.
test_examples.mt: If the security patch is not installed within 24 days, app usage will be suspended.
test_examples.error_description: Critical time unit error: '시간' (hours) mistranslated as 'days' - 24x time extension creates security vulnerability. Tests safety-critical detail attention - all Claude models should catch this severe error.

test_examples.src: 화면 밝기를 최대로 설정하면 배터리 소모가 증가합니다.
test_examples.mt: Setting screen brightness to minimum will increase battery consumption.
test_examples.error_description: Value inversion error: '최대로' (maximum) translated as 'minimum' - opposite setting with incorrect cause-effect relationship. Tests logical consistency - Opus should detect this contradiction.

test_examples.src: 데이터를 클라우드에 백업하는 중입니다. 진행률: 67%, 예상 완료 시간: 3분
test_examples.mt: Backing up data to cloud. Progress: 67%
test_examples.error_description: Information loss: Missing critical ETA information '예상 완료 시간: 3분' (estimated completion time: 3 minutes). Tests attention to detail - Opus should be most sensitive to missing information.

test_examples.src: 푸시 알림
test_examples.error_description: Complete translation failure: Critical UI label left empty, rendering feature inaccessible. Tests basic translation completion - all models should severely penalize empty output.

test_examples.src: 사용자 프로필이 업데이트되었습니다. 변경사항을 확인하세요.
test_examples.mt: User profile have been updated. Check the changes.
test_examples.error_description: Subject-verb disagreement: 'have been' should be 'has been' for singular subject. Tests grammatical precision - Opus should be most strict, Haiku might be more lenient.

test_examples.src: 연결이 일시적으로 중단되었습니다. 재시도하는 중...
test_examples.mt: Connection temporarly interrupted. Retrying...
test_examples.error_description: Spelling error: 'temporarly' should be 'temporarily'. Tests spelling sensitivity - models may vary in how harshly they penalize minor typos.

test_examples.src: 생체 인증을 사용하여 로그인하세요.
test_examples.mt: biometric authentication login use please
test_examples.error_description: Severe grammatical breakdown: Korean word order directly mapped to English without restructuring. Tests basic fluency recognition - even Haiku should catch this obvious error.

test_examples.src: 네이버페이로 결제를 진행하시겠습니까?
test_examples.mt: Would you like to proceed with Naver Payment?
test_examples.error_description: Brand name localization error: '네이버페이' should remain as 'Naver Pay' (official brand name) not literal 'Naver Payment'. Tests cultural adaptation - Opus should better understand brand naming conventions.

test_examples.src: 2024년 12월 31일 23:59까지 유효합니다.
test_examples.error_description: Date format error: Using European DD/MM/YYYY format instead of US MM/DD/YYYY for English localization. Tests localization awareness - Opus should better understand regional conventions.

test_examples.src: 안녕하십니까, 고객님. 기술 지원이 필요하시면 연락해 주세요.
test_examples.mt: Hey! Need tech support? Just hit us up!
test_examples.error_description: Extreme formality mismatch: Formal Korean customer service (honorifics, 고객님) to casual slang English. Tests register sensitivity - Opus should be most sensitive to appropriateness.

test_examples.src: 사용자의 행동 패턴을 분석하여 맞춤형 콘텐츠를 제공합니다.
test_examples.mt: We analyze user behavior patterns to provide personalized content.
test_examples.error_description: Subtle formality shift: Korean impersonal description vs English first-person 'We', creating slightly different corporate voice. Tests nuanced register sensitivity - Opus should be most attuned to subtle voice differences.

test_examples.src: 이 앱은 귀하의 개인정보를 보호하며, 수집된 데이터는 암호화되어 안전하게 저장됩니다.
test_examples.mt: This app protects your personal information, and collected data is encrypted and stored securely.
test_examples.error_description: Register inconsistency within sentence: '귀하의' (formal 'your') suggests formal tone, but English translation uses casual 'your' instead of 'your personal'. Tests intra-sentence register consistency - Opus should detect mixed formality levels.

test_examples.src: 메모리를 정리하여 앱 성능을 향상시킵니다.
test_examples.mt: Clean up storage to improve app performance.
test_examples.error_description: Technical term confusion: '메모리' (memory/RAM) mistranslated as 'storage' (disk space). Different technical concepts. Tests technical precision - Opus should be most accurate with technical distinctions.

test_examples.src: 작업을 완료하려면 추가 권한이 필요합니다.
test_examples.mt: Additional permissions are required to complete the operation.
test_examples.error_description: Terminology inconsistency: '작업' translated as 'operation' instead of standard UI term 'task' or 'action'. Tests consistency awareness - Opus should prefer standard UI vocabulary.

test_examples.src: 구매 내역을 확인하시려면 계정 설정 > 구매 이력을 선택하세요.
test_examples.mt: To check purchase history, select Account Settings > Purchase Records.
test_examples.error_description: UI terminology inconsistency: '구매 이력' (purchase history) translated as 'Purchase Records' instead of matching the first part 'purchase history'. Tests UI consistency - Opus should maintain consistent terminology.

test_examples.src: 새로운 업데이트가 있습니다. 지금 업데이트하시겠습니까?
test_examples.mt: There is a new update available. Would you like to update now?
test_examples.error_description: Accurate and natural translation: Clear meaning preservation, appropriate UI vocabulary, polite question form maintained. Tests standard update notification handling across all models.

claude_haiku_strengths: Speed and efficiency for obvious errors
claude_opus_strengths: Brand name and proper noun handling
designed_differences: Subtle register mismatches (Opus should be most sensitive)
Technical term precision (Opus should distinguish memory vs storage)
Brand name localization (Opus should know official names)
Intra-sentence consistency (Opus should catch mixed formality)
Minor spelling vs major errors (models may weight differently)
Cultural adaptation depth (Opus should understand regional conventions)

accuracy.mistranslation: Wrong meaning conveyed - semantic errors that change the intended message
accuracy.omission: Missing information - source content not included in translation
accuracy.addition: Extra information added - content not present in source
accuracy.untranslated: No translation provided - source text left as is or empty

fluency.grammar: Grammatical errors - verb conjugation, agreement, tense, number
fluency.spelling: Spelling or typo errors in the translation
fluency.word_order: Incorrect word order making text awkward or incomprehensible

terminology.inconsistent: Inconsistent use of terms within the app context

style.register: Formality mismatch - inappropriate tone for context

locale.cultural: Failed cultural adaptation - names, concepts, references
locale.format: Wrong format for dates, numbers, currency for target locale
